name: Living
description: Discover sofas, recliners, lounges, and armchairs designed for everyday comfort and timeless elegance. Perfect for modern homes where relaxation meets style.

name: Dining
description: Bring people together with dining tables, chairs, and sets crafted for both casual meals and formal gatherings. Designed to balance functionality and sophistication.

name: Bedroom
description: Create your personal sanctuary with beds, frames, and bedroom essentials. Blending comfort and design to ensure restful nights and beautiful interiors.

name: Outdoor
description: Enjoy the outdoors with weather-resistant lounges, tables, and chairs. Built for durability and style, making open-air living both comfortable and inviting.
